#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
main()
{
  int t;cin>>t;
   while(t!=0)
   { t--;
      unsigned long long int a,b;int q,s;
     scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
     int x[10]={0};
     int y[10]={0};
     while(a!=0)
     {
        q=a%10;
        x[q]++;
         a=a/10;
     }
     while(b!=0)
     {
       q=b%10;
        y[q]++;
        b=b/10;
     }q=0;s=0;
     for(int i=0;i<10;i++)
     {
         if(x[i]!=0)
         {
            q++;
           if(x[i]==y[i])
            s++;
          }
     }
     if(s==q)
       cout<<"1"<<endl;
     else
       cout<<"0"<<endl;
   }
}
